ModMetaData.name: Project Overmind - Mindshift Abilities
ModMetaData.author: AIvanCP
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 6 unique psionic abilities to RimWorld inspired by various games and media. Features tactical teleportation, mind control, intelligence gathering, detection, and powerful global effects.
Abilities: - Translocate Target (Lv3): Instantly relocate any pawn to a new position - Mind Spike (Lv3): Seize enemy minds and force them to attack their allies - Mind Read (Lv3): Reveal complete mental profile including hidden quest intentions - Inspiration (Lv4): Global buff - massive productivity boost for all colonists - I See You (Lv5): Reveal all hidden/invisible entities on the map - Hallucination (Lv5): Global debuff - cause panic and combat penalties in enemies
Compatible with Vanilla Psycasts Expanded, Combat Extended, and other psycast mods. All abilities obtainable via Psytrainer from traders or quest rewards.
Requires: Royalty DLC (for psycasting framework)
